programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure) S1 (18/33)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band) S1 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band»Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S4 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Super bébé) S5 (9/13)
programme.desc: «Super bébé»When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter»When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Tina's New Friend»While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Medievel Tides) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Medievel Tides»When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme) S6 (7/26)
programme.desc: «La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme»Gustavo comes to play the guitar during the campfire concert. Mayor Humdinger also wants to give a concert and is looking for a way to make beautiful music. Yumi's baby goats enter the yoga class and this is how the idea of ??goat yoga arises.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La grande décision de Paddington) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «La grande décision de Paddington»On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le printemps) S3 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le printemps»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre) S8 (22/24)
programme.desc: «Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre»Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les Bébés tortues de mer) S1 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les Bébés tortues de mer»Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune) S2 (n°210)
programme.desc: «Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune»Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade? // Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes. Lola activates her Critter Care Centre to help everyone!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une vie de star / Méchant Hank) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Une vie de star / Méchant Hank»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sleeping Like a Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Sleeping Like a Baby»Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (n°38)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hiccups) S1 (n°40)
programme.desc: «Hiccups»Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (34/52)
programme.desc: «L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Bébé Alexandre) S3 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Bébé Alexandre»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le phare de Papy Rabbit) S3 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Le phare de Papy Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 (n°11)
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket - and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George realise that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Going into the Wild) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Going into the Wild»The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les T-Rex égarés) S4 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Les T-Rex égarés»Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'anniversaire de Starla) S6 (11/24)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Starla»Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure) S1 (18/33)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.desc: «Tina's New Friend»While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme) S6 (7/26)
programme.desc: «La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme»Gustavo comes to play the guitar during the campfire concert. Mayor Humdinger also wants to give a concert and is looking for a way to make beautiful music. Yumi's baby goats enter the yoga class and this is how the idea of ??goat yoga arises.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La grande décision de Paddington) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «La grande décision de Paddington»On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux) S8 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux»The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent»Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Trésor légendaire / La Journée du oui) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Le Trésor légendaire / La Journée du oui»After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Lagoon Lemonade) S1 (23/28)
programme.desc: «Lagoon Lemonade»When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (n°34)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le pique-nique) S1 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique»Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les déguisements) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les déguisements»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mystère et... boulette de viande) S4 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Mystère et... boulette de viande»When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course du paquet-cadeau doré) S6 (12/24)
programme.desc: «La course du paquet-cadeau doré»Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur) S3 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur»Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent) S3 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent»"Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol and recruits Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. But when their actions attract the attention of a hungry eagle, Alex has to rescue his own team. // Alex loses his first tooth... then really loses it. He can't find it anywhere! The Paw Patrol is hot on the tooth's trail, and everyone is determined to find it before the Tooth Fairy comes!".

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.
